mapper.select: SELECT `SBE_CMT_SEQ` AS commentSeq, `SBE_CMT_CONTENTS` AS commentContents, `SBE_CMT_REG_USR_ID` AS commentRegUsrId, DATE_FORMAT(`SBE_CMT_REG_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS commentRegDate, B.`SBE_USR_NAME` AS commentRegUsrName FROM `SBE_CMT` A INNER JOIN `SBE_USR` B ON A.`SBE_CMT_REG_USR_ID` = B.`SBE_USR_ID` WHERE `SBE_CMT_POS_SEQ` = #{postSeq} ORDER BY `SBE_CMT_SEQ` DESC LIMIT #{page}, 3
